body.value:
Palliative Care Mentorship Selective

 

This 6-week longitudinal mentoring course seeks to foster a culture of mentoring by supporting mid-level and senior palliative care investigators in further developing their mentoring skills to successfully draw new investigators into palliative care research. Each week, the course will cover mentoring topics including maintaining effective communication, aligning expectations, assessing understanding, addressing equity and inclusion, fostering independence, and promoting professional development. All of these topics will be addressed through the lens of the context of diversity, equity, and inclusion and how they can impact mentoring relationships. Instruction will occur over videoconference for one hour per week.

field_subtitle.value: This 6-week longitudinal mentoring course seeks to foster a culture of mentoring to draw new investigators into palliative care research.
